TopicTitle: KSP crashes when left idle or whenever it feels like it.

Articles.Content:
[KSP Version]: 0.25.0.642 (WindowsPlayer) Steam (x64) Full Screen

What Happens: Game locks and no other indication of crash unless alt-tab out. Then, can not click ok to close report as everything switches back to KSP. Only exit is kill process.

Mods / Add-Ons: All Stock

Steps to Replicate:

Unknown - various builds, no common parts

Result: Game locks

Fixes/Workarounds:

- none

Logs found here:

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/4zgfcfyaltrxg13/AABuIFvOVqKHTO0H44JPSYWwa?dl=0
